snippet: Cory A. Booker has registered his campaign committee to pursue the seat long held by a fellow Democrat, Frank R. Lautenberg, who has yet to say whether he will run for re-election next year.
abstract: Mayor Cory A Booker of Newark takes first official step toward running for United States Senate in 2014; registers his campaign committee to pursue the seat long held by fellow Democrat Frank R Lautenberg, who has yet to say whether he will run for re-election next year.
lead_paragraph: Cory A. Booker has registered his campaign committee to pursue the seat long held by a fellow Democrat, Frank R. Lautenberg, who has yet to say whether he will run for re-election next year.

headline.seo: Mayor Cory Booker of Newark Takes Step to Seek Senate Seat
headline.main: Newark Mayor Takes First Official Step Toward a Senate Run
headline.print_headline: Newark’s Mayor Takes First Step Toward a Senate Run
